news_title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Options Worth $3.15 Billion Expire Today
news_subtitle: Bitcoin and Ethereum options totaling $3.15 billion are set to expire today, impacting market stability. Read original article on coinlive.me

news_title: Rep. Max Miller Introduces New Crypto Tax Framework
news_subtitle: Rep. Max Miller announces a crypto tax framework with de minimis exemptions, affecting mining and staking. Read original article on theccpress.com

news_title: US lawmakers propose tax break for small stablecoin payments, staking rewards
news_subtitle: US lawmakers unveiled a draft bill that would exempt small stablecoin payments from capital gains taxes and allow crypto staking rewards to be taxed years later.

news_title: Bitcoin Faces the Biggest Options Expiry in History on December 26
news_subtitle: Bitcoin is heading into the largest options expiry ever, with over $23.8B in contracts set to expire on December 26.
